text: Arroyo Gardens is a census-designated place (CDP) in Cameron County, in the U.S. state of Texas. The population was 456 at the 2010 census. Prior to the 2010 census the community was part of the Arroyo Gardens-La Tina Ranch CDP. It is part of the Brownsville-Harlingen Metropolitan Statistical Area. ==Geography== Arroyo Gardens is in north-central Cameron County, east of Harlingen and north of Brownsville. It is bordered on the east by La Tina Ranch. According to the United States Census Bureau, the CDP has a total area of , of which is land and , or 1.03%, is water. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in Cameron County, Texas Category:Census- designated places in Texas
title: Arroyo Gardens, Texas
